25.eng-name: The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)

hadiths.text: AbdurRahman ibn Bishr al-Ansari al-Azraq said:Two men from the locality of Kindah came while AbuMas'ud al-Ansari was sitting n a circle. They said: Is there any man who decides between us. A man from the circle said: I, AbuMas'ud took a handful of pebbles and threw at him, saying: Hush! It is disapproved to make haste in decision

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي طَلَبِ الْقَضَاءِ وَالتَّسَرُّعِ إِلَيْهِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Seeking The Position Of Judge and Hastening To Accept That Position
